Text:
I've once been fortunate to se a man from Tuva perform throat-singing, and it was, indeed, a very captivating experience! He had a very, very deep bass ringing from his throat all the time, and managed to get overtones at the same time. Rather difficult to explain, but You'll never forget the sound of it once You've heard it.

It's best percieved when it's not accompanied by other people singing or other instruments playing.

Thanks for sharing this!
Mongol strupsång??? Vad är det för svengelska?

Sikka jävla funderingar en del har.
Tryck bakåt så slipper du irritera dig.
I've been looking for this, please keep seeding! Tnx
